es.ull.isaatc.simulation.parallel.flow
Class StructuredLoopFlow

java.lang.Object
  es.ull.isaatc.simulation.parallel.SimulationObject
      es.ull.isaatc.simulation.parallel.flow.BasicFlow
          es.ull.isaatc.simulation.parallel.flow.SingleSuccessorFlow
              es.ull.isaatc.simulation.parallel.flow.StructuredFlow
                  es.ull.isaatc.simulation.parallel.flow.StructuredLoopFlow
All Implemented Interfaces:
FinalizerFlow, Flow, InitializerFlow, SingleSuccessorFlow, StructuredFlow, StructuredLoopFlow, TaskFlow, Identifiable, SimulationObject, java.lang.Comparable<SimulationObject>
Direct Known Subclasses:
DoWhileFlow, ForLoopFlow, WhileDoFlow
public abstract class StructuredLoopFlow
extends StructuredFlow
implements StructuredLoopFlow

A structured flow which defines a repetitive subflow. Different subclasses of this class represent different loop structures: while-do, do-while, for... Meets the Structured Loop pattern (WFP21).

Author:
ycallero

Constructor Detail

StructuredLoopFlow

public StructuredLoopFlow(Simulation simul,
                          InitializerFlow initialSubFlow,
                          FinalizerFlow finalSubFlow)
Create a new StructuredLoopFlow starting in initialSubFlow and finishing in finalSubFlow.

Parameters:
simul - Simulation this flow belongs to
initialSubFlow - First step of the internal subflow
finalSubFlow - Last step of the internal subflow

StructuredLoopFlow

public StructuredLoopFlow(Simulation simul,
                          TaskFlow subFlow)
Create a new StructuredLoopFlow consisting of a unique flow.

Parameters:
simul - Simulation this flow belongs to
subFlow - A unique flow defining an internal subflow
